name: Super Mirror (+ Source)
description:
--- YOU NEED JAVA 6 OR LATER TO PLAY ---

A flashy, fast-paced infinite runner that has players controlling two sides of a mirror image. A small game I made in about a week or so. I might end up updating it, but I have no plans to at the moment.

-------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Jump: Up / Down / Space / W / X

-------------------------------------------------------

Super Mirror, by lectvs (https://twitter.com/lectvs)

With music by Bossfight (https://www.youtube.com/user/BossfightSwe)
